pr_title: Adding functionality to push a manifest list

timeline.message: Adding functionality to push the manifest list

timeline.bodyText: Hmm... I think we should do something about the "image id" when pushing a manifest list. It doesn't make sense to return a container configuration digest.
timeline.author: chanseokoh
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -37,8 +38,8 @@
 import java.util.concurrent.Callable;
 
 /**
- * Pushes a manifest for a tag. Returns the manifest digest ("image digest") and the container
- * configuration digest ("image id") as {#link BuildResult}.
+ * Pushes a manifestTemplate for a tag. Returns the manifestTemplate digest ("image digest") and the
+ * container configuration digest ("image id") as {#link BuildResult}.

replies.bodyText: A manifest list doesn't have a container config so yes we don't have an image id for a manifest list.
replies.author: louismurerwa

replies.bodyText:
Pushes a manifest or a manifest list for a tag. If not a manifest list, returns the manifest digest ("image digest") and the container configuration digest ("image id") as {@link BuildResult}. If a manifest list, returns the manifest list digest only.
And note the original Javadoc has a typo: {#link BuildResult} --> {@link BuildResult}
replies.author: chanseokoh

timeline.author: chanseokoh

timeline.bodyText:
I feel like this should be @Nullable DescriptorDigest imageId now that this doesn't apply to a manifest list.
That will trigger cascading changes to BuildResult, which requires a separate PR. I guess the BuildResult.imageId also needs to be @Nullable and BuildResuilt.getImageId() should return Optional<DescriptorDigest>.
timeline.author: chanseokoh
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -107,7 +147,7 @@
       BuildContext buildContext,
       ProgressEventDispatcher.Factory progressEventDispatcherFactory,
       RegistryClient registryClient,
-      BuildableManifestTemplate manifestTemplate,
+      ManifestTemplate manifestTemplate,
       String imageQualifier,
       DescriptorDigest imageDigest,
       DescriptorDigest imageId) {

replies.bodyText: Hmm... now that we're pushing a manifest list, maybe it's better to make the class return a manifest digest only instead of a BuildResult.
replies.author: chanseokoh

replies.bodyText: I can make a separate PR to do this change - which one do you prefer between the two.
replies.author: louismurerwa

replies.bodyText: I think we need to discuss this with the team. We need to think about what to return in the end when multi-platform image building. This will most likely require changing the jib-core public API.
replies.author: chanseokoh

replies.bodyText: Sounds Good .We can talk about this in the Jib Team Review tomorrow.
replies.author: louismurerwa

Ah, I see the last test failure was not because of the progress but a digest mistach.
In light of this, probably the short-circuiting in #2724 (comment) should go inside the try-resource block.
